titleInfo.subTitle: TENTATIVE FINDINGS regarding the Presentence Investigation Report as to Defendant David Shaffer. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (JB)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Shaffer
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to David Shaffer. Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 51 months; 3 years Supervised Release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment. Defendant shall surrender for service no eariler than December 11, 2006 at 2:00 p.m. as to defendant David Shaffer. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. 4 certified copies to USM(DKM, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Shaffer
titleInfo.subTitle: AMENDED JUDGMENT for reduction of sentence 42 as to David Shaffer (1). Defendant pleaded guilty to count I of the Indictment and is committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of time served; 3 years Supervised Release with special conditions; $100 Special Assessment remitted. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (4 Certified copies to USM)(JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Shaffer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER regarding PETITION FOR OFFENDER UNDER SUPERVISION 49 as to defendant David Shaffer. The defendant should be held to answer for a final dispositional hearing before Judge Smith Camp. A final dispositional hearing will be held before Judge Laurie Smith Camp in Courtroom No.2, Third Floor, Roman L. Hruska U.S. Courthouse, 111 South 18th Plaza, Omaha, Nebraska, on January 11, 2010 at 10:30 a.m. Defendant must be present in person.The defendant is committed to the custody of the Attorney General or his designated representative for confinement in a correctional facility. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MLF, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER regarding PETITION FOR OFFENDER UNDER SUPERVISION 49 as to defendant David Shaffer. Ordered by Magistrate Judge F. A. Gossett. (1 Certified copy to USM)(MLF, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Shaffer
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER - As stated in Filing No. 62, the Defendant's motion at Filing No. 61 is granted. The Defendant shall be released from the Douglas County Correctional Center on January 21, 2010, to a representative of the Federal Public Defender's Office for transportation to the location specified in Filing No. 61. The Clerk shall immediately deliver a copy of this order to the U.S. Marshal for this district, as to defendant David Shaffer. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM)(JAE)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER - As stated in Filing No. 62, the Defendant's motion at Filing No. 61 is granted. The Defendant shall be released from the Douglas County Correctional Center on January 21, 2010, to a representative of the Federal Public Defender's Office for transportation to the location specified in Filing No. 61. The Clerk shall immediately deliver a copy of this order to the U.S. Marshal for this district, as to defendant David Shaffer. Ordered by Judge Laurie Smith Camp. (1 Certified copy to USM)(JAE)
